Shopify Rich Text Grid Section

Learn how to create a Rich Text Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Rich Text Grid section is a versatile content block for your Shopify store that allows you to dynamically create rich text layouts using a grid system. You can mix headlines, paragraphs, and other rich text elements to create engaging and structured content. This section is designed for flexibility and offers various customization options for fonts, colors, spacing, and alignment to match your store's aesthetic.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Rich Text Grid"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Descriptions: Use the Rich Text Grid to highlight product features, benefits, and specifications in a structured layout. This helps in breaking down information into easily digestible sections for your customers.
  2. Blog Posts: Enhance your blog posts with a combination of headlines, paragraphs, and bullet points to create a visually appealing and easy-to-read format.
  3. About Us Page: Present your brand story, mission, and values using a combination of headlines and descriptive text to create an engaging narrative.
  4. Promotional Content: Use the grid to arrange promotional messages, offers, and banners in a clean and organized manner, making it easy for customers to find important information.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Text Settings:

    • Text Font: Choose the font for your rich text content.
    • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text (10px to 50px, default: 15px).
    • Text Line Height: Select the line height for the text (default: 1.15).

  2. Headline Settings:

    • Headline Font: Choose the font for headlines.
    • Headline Size: Adjust the size of the headlines (10px to 50px, default: 25px).
    • Headline Line Height: Select the line height for headlines (default: 1.15).

  3. Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Set the background color or gradient for the section.
    • Text Color: Choose the color for the rich text.
    • Headline Color: Choose the color for the headlines.

  4. Dimension Settings:

    • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width for the section (default: 1000px).
    • Gap Between Columns: Adjust the gap between columns in the grid (default: 25px).
    • Padding: Customize the padding for the top, bottom, left, and right sides of the section.
    • Element Spacing: Set the spacing between individual elements within the section (default: 15px).

  5. Block Settings (for each text block):

    • Alignment: Choose the text alignment (default: left).
    • Rich Text: Add and style your text content using rich text capabilities.
